text: Water running out of the sink. Lady drying the plate. Child getting cookies out of a cookie jar. Standing on a stool that is tipping over. Little girl reaching up for a cookie. Curtains at the window. Path outside. Tree. A window into another room. Shrubbery. Grass. Two cups and a plate sitting on the counter top. Cupboards. The lady has an apron on. Dress. Slippers. The boy has on a short sleeve shirt, short pants, socks, shoes.
